name: Raven's Point Demo
description:
Welcome to Raven's Point.

Raven's Point is a fast-paced, thrilling horror boss rush where your mind is your worst enemy. Find clues to unlock rooms, collect items and tools, and defeat four terrifying, unique boss fights as you uncover the mysteries of this strange town.

Join the Raven's Point Discord server for frequent teasers, trailers, and to chat with others!

The Demo

While the game is still in development, a demo is currently available for one of the boss fights. Feel free to give it a try!

Controls

MoveWASDSprintShiftClose eyesSpacebar
FlashlightFInteractLeft clickInventoryTabPauseEscape

Support me

I'm a solo developer spending almost all of my free time on this project, so of course any support helps a great deal. If you'd like to support me financially, consider leaving a donation when you download the game. Don't want to donate but still want to help? Consider sharing the game with your friends!
